name: PowerGateLD
description:
Instructions:

  • Left Mouse Button/Tap to Shoot Move.
  • Left Mouse Button/Tap and Hold to Move and Autofire.
  • Destroy enemies to find power ups.
  • Use the powerups to travel through warp gates.
  • Find the special end screen.

Update: 

Fixed or made less terrible:

  • Getting stuck in walls.
  • Tap to shoot.
  • Turning around more responsive.
